featured.text: In 2011, a minister, Ryu Matsumoto, was forced to resign after only a week in office, when a bad-tempered encounter with local officials was televised.

definition.zh_def: 脾氣；情緒的狀態或傾向。
definition.en_def: A person's state of mind or disposition, often relating to their mood or emotional response.
definition.example: He has a quick temper and gets angry easily.
